summary: The true story of lifelong criminal and serial killer, Carl Panzram who wrote his autobiography for a jail guard in 1928.
cast: John DiMaggio|Tom Lodewyck|David Salmonson|Brett Jetmund|David Weiss|Douglas Wynne|Matthew Aaron|David Schmidt|William Frederick Knight|Robert Earl Ray|Mark Gado|G. Thomas Gitchoff|Henry Lesser|Scott Christianson|Katherine Ramsland|Charlie Rodgers|Joe Coleman|Joel Goodman|Kenneth M. LaMaster|Charles Dudley Martin|Jason Schubert
title: Carl Panzram: The Spirit of Hatred and Vengeance
